entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MeterListener can't listen to RuntimeMetrics #110252
  • Error: Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #110251
  • System.TypeInitializationException in ActivityListener when accessing ActivitySource from a static field #110249
  • For polymorphic deserialization, the type discriminator property cannot be set to required. #110248
  • ``PersistedAssemblyBuilder`` generates invalid IL when loading fields with generic type parameters #110247
  • Sporadic Roslyn crash with .NET 8.0.404 #110245
  • Add a `JsonObject.TryAdd` method. #110244
  • build hit error ijw.cpp(19): error C3611: “System::Numerics::INumb erBase::System::IUtf8SpanFormattable.TryFormat”: 密封函数不能具有纯说明符 #110243
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics failing on native AOT #110240
  • Consider annotations on the list of types (?) #110239
  • The name passed to `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` is case sensitive but the error message indicates the name is "invariant" which isn't correct #110236
    Future

Closed

  • `JsonSourceGenerator` can fail with `global using` aliases #110242
  • https://silver-succotash-5g4jvr76xxxxfvwrw-3000.app.github.dev/ #110255
  • https://silver-succotash-5g4jvr76xxxxfvwrw-3000.app.github.dev/ #110256
  • https://silver-succotash-5g4jvr76xxxxfvwrw-3000.app.github.dev/ #110257
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis equivalent of JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute/UsedImplicitlyAttribute #110215
  • Warn if RequiresXXXCode is placed on UnmanagedCallersOnly method with entrypoint #109811
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #110179
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up `fgGlobalMorph` checks in morph #108875
    10.0.0
  • OrderedDictionary perf with bad hashing #109293
    Future
  • JsonSchemaExporter modifies the static JsonSchema.True when there is a custom converter and TransformSchemaNode is set #110241
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http is not being copied #110213
  • Performance regression with System.Numerics.Vector when retargeting from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110223
  • The DAM properties does not propagate from BaseType #110237
  • The new TimeSpan FromMilliseconds overload breaks System.Linq.Expressions #109833
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update unhandled exception handler API to match approved shape. #110254
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove lexical dependences in switch recognition #110253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable GFNI tests for NAOT #110250
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `GetHardwareIntrinsicId` on 32bit platforms #110238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Warn if RequiresXXXCode is placed on an entrypoint #110185
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Sync list of short stacks for VMR build #110246
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove `fgRenumberBlocks` calls in loop opt phases #110227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add winget to windows-requirements.md #110233
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110078
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #109698
    area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Remove references to "CSE candidate" in morph #110218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MT][Firefox] Disable multithreading tests on Firefox #110155
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix stubs for `HybridGlobalization` #110183
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, linkable-framework, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.1
  • Add `TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(long)` overload #110234
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update .NET 8 build images to use Azure Linux #110199
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Provide more info on the failing CustomAttributeProvider #110230
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Properly handle exceptions thrown by mono_marshal_get_native_wrapper #110232
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Only define _XOPEN_SOURCE in configurecompiler.cmake (for consistency) #110092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix increment in decreasing loop in non-shipping code #110219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2591303 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add a feature flag to not use GVM in Linq Select #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Reflection complains about ambiguity when querying async2 methods #2815

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix GC holes for suspended runtime-async methods + collectible assemblies #2759

PullRequests

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Keep `LoaderAllocator` objects alive from continuations #2812
    area-async

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] Describe protocol constraints #2811
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added support for size, stride, alignment, and the value witness table #2813
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I can't complete my project because of a false positive fatal error #45217
  • Allow for automatic workload installation by specifying required workloads in `global.json` #45216
  • Cross compilation on Ubuntu 22.04 to ARM from AMD #45208
  • Even if I set linux-bionic-arm64 --self-contained=true, dotnet libraries are requested when running it. #45206
  • Wrong workload versions installed when pinned to .NET 8 via `global.json` on latest GitHub Action windows runners #45204

PullRequests

Merged

  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Set outputParentDirectory for 1ES outputs #45198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix VMR Final Join stage #45205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2591265 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump darc #45186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: extensions #8697

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code completion on override method doesn't apply correctly #76141
  • CS8762 issues: unnecessarily pops up in a NotNullWhen+MaybeNullWhen combination and in some cases doesn't pop up at all #76140
  • Visual Studio adds second quotation mark in unappropriate situations #59427 [Still not fixed] #76138
  • dotnet watch crashed while applying a code change. #76137
  • Trimming Error When Publishing Project Using Source Generator #76132
  • Test plan for "extensions" feature #76130

Closed

  • Go to implementation broken (ctrl+f12) in VS 2022 17.12 #75974
    17.14 P1
  • CollectionExpressionSyntax vs ImplicitArrayCreationExpressionSyntax difference in behaviour #76136
  • Test plan for "roles" features #66722
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • avoid ITextSnapshotLine.GetText() #76133
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use new championed proposal and test plan for "extensions" feature #76131
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Update the patterns that 'use range operator' supports. #76129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove Navigate_asynchronously_exerimental option #76128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Exclude starting symbol when going to implementations if we find implementations #76125
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Document approach for compiler-recognized attributes and LangVersion #76112
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76134
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAPI - Polymorphism class does not work for response #59214
  • APP_POOL_ID environmental variable is null when Preload = True #59213
  • Race condition in RedisCache leading to non-expiring keys #59211
  • JwtBearer middleware silently fails without Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.JsonWebTokens dependency #59210

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #59205
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59203
  • Blazor Streaming Not Working #59206
  • Why is UUID performance slightly worse than other frameworks? #54050
  • Blazor issue with Akamai #59176
  • Open API generation: missing required option '--project'. #59157
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop #59204

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    community-contribution, area-networking

Updated

  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update README.md #59191
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • emulator chashes when dragged on second screen #26211
  • Enable .NET MAUI on source.dot.net #26210
    .NET 9 SR2
  • VisualState does not reset when it is set from an implicit style and the style is removed/changed #26208
  • Local resources not working in release configuration with more than one resource inside #26206
  • Android - CollectionView scroll wrong item when set animation is false #26191
  • MAUI Templates are not visible in Visual Studio #26189
  • [MAUI] Select items traces are preserved #26187
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off #26186
  • Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26185
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • It will freeze when 1 minutes later when I show some graphicsView? #26184
  • StringFormat='{0:c}' doesn't show dollar sign in .NET MAUI 9 #26183
  • CollectionView's Items Aren't Selected When a Parent Has a TapGestureRecognizer #26182
  • ScrollView seem wrong with Border.Stroke Thickness change #26181

Closed

  • [Windows] - Top Tab Visibility Changes Not Reflected Until Tab Switch #25913
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Win: Button clicked event and command will not be occurred in EmptyView of CollectionView #19609
    .NET 9 SR2
  • How to write the registry #26207
  • [ci] Fix signing identities missing on some bots #25948
    .NET 9 SR2
  • XAML errors frequently do not reference the file with an issue #21038
    .NET 9 SR2
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar does not work on iOS with more than 5 tabs #26164
  • An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #22055
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Add new templates to localization #26175
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell FlyoutItem Title always disappears strangely #26195
  • Get localization lcl translations handback working #26176
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Label display bug #26151
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25707
  • MAUI 8.0.82 raises on Android Javax.Crypto.AEADBadTagException #24986
  • [Android] Line breaks not occurring when pressing Enter in Entry configured as multiline, even with ImeOptions set to None. #25952
  • Unpackaged windows build does not include font resources #25929
  • RadioButton not visible on iOS - ContentPage #23937
  • .Net 8 MAUI Memory Leaks after navigating to multiple pages and then navigating to root page. #24409
  • MSBuild <Include /> (global using directive) does not work for platform-specific namespaces #23986
  • Image and Font Failed to load on iPhone 15 plus which results to a white empty page #25796
  • NU1100 & NU1103 396 erreurs je ne sais plus quoi faire #25714
  • NET MAUI app template not available on Visual Studio #25808
  • `ViewHandler<TVirtualView, TPlatformView>.PlatformView` getter throws `InvalidOperationException` #25908
  • .NET MAUI 9 does not support Android 14.0 (API 34) #25898
  • .NET Maui app crashes on startup on 17.10.5 #25963

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading" #26212
    i/regression, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #26204
    area-testing
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Child Span font attributes inheritance #26197
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix issue with template processing #26196
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 22 #26193
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Provided description for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button #26192
    area-templates, community ✨, t/a11y
  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    area-essentials, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] - Fix for Shell Section Visibility changes not reflected until Tab switch #26130
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [ci] See if we can provision by default on devdiv #26170
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Fix randomly failing tests on CI #26120
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Added ToggleSystemAnimations method to Appium helper methods #26096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml, p/0, .NET 9 SR2
  • Make MauiAppCompatEditText public #26146
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 19 #26100
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #26051
    area-animation, area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add three templates to locproject.json #26178
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Change Yaml to use OneLocTool to create PR after we receive the lcl files #26177
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10628913 #26174

Updated

  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Toolbar overflow menu icon color #25627
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix Tweener leak on Animation #26143
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [ci] Remove use of System.Formats.Asn1 by removing Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core #26163
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Added tests to validate the ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property in CarouselView #26160
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, stale, area-gestures
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 20 #26142
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 21 #26168
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The specified deps.json [...] does not exist. Missing net8.0 in path #35234
  • Add dependency injection support to `IEntityTypeConfiguration` when using `ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly` #35233
  • Consider solutions for removing the need to specify same cmdline arguments all the time for the tools #35231
    Backlog
  • IDbCommandInterceptor.CommandFailed does not capture all command exceptions #35229

Closed

  • RelationalQueryableMethodTranslatingExpressionVisitor now accepts RelationalQueryCompilationContext and not QueryCompilationContext #35226
  • Try EF Core 9 now! #33030
    Discussions
  • Nullable value type used with coalescing operator in argument to non-nullable aggregate function throws #35227
  • Add a REPL for dotnet-ef #35125
  • Running dotnet-ef migrations bundle in a Azure pipeline #35157

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle comparers for nullable value types in primitive collections #35235
  • See how SqlClient 6 runs #35232
  • [release/9.0] Set environment variables to "Development" when creating DbContext using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #35230
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35124
  • [release/9.0] Prevent owner entity from becoming optional #35222
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Add more specific messages when pending model changes are detected #35221
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35228
    Servicing-approved
